meanings.definition: Relating to the region immediately beneath the skin.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used a hypodermic cream to treat the rash on my arm.
meanings.sent2: The hypodermic layer of the skin is sensitive to touch.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a hypodermic superhero with my skin-protecting shield.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a hypodermic effect, piercing through my emotions.
meanings.sent5: The hypodermic sensation of the cold wind made me shiver.

meanings.definition: A small syringe with a needle used for injecting substances beneath the skin.
meanings.sent1: The nurse carefully disposed of the used hypodermic after the injection.
meanings.sent2: The doctor used a hypodermic to administer the vaccine painlessly.
meanings.sent3: The hypodermic needle looked like a tiny sword ready for battle.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a hypodermic, injecting hope into her heart.
meanings.sent5: The hypodermic glint of the needle made me nervous before the shot.
